summary: Testing complete for Star Rating Teams 'View members' fix and Employee Check-In sync to Admin Attendance. All features working correctly.

star_rating_teams_view_members.description: When clicking 'View members' in Teams tab, the teams table is completely hidden and replaced by Team Details view
verified_elements: Teams table shows Team, Members, Team Stars, Avg, Actions columns
'View members' button present in Actions column
Clicking 'View members' completely hides teams table
Team Details view shows as separate dedicated section

star_rating_team_details_view.description: Team Details view shows member cards with all required information
verified_elements: Team name and member count displayed (e.g., 'Compiler - Auto Differentiation â€” 6 members')
Member cards show: Name, Email, Stars, Unsafe counts
Each card has View and Add action buttons
Back button present to return to Teams list

star_rating_back_button.description: Back button in Team Details view returns to Teams list correctly
verified_elements: Clicking Back returns to Teams table view
Teams table visible again after clicking Back

admin_attendance_check_ins.description: Admin Attendance module shows all employee check-ins from today
verified_elements: 3 employee check-ins displayed (Adhitya Charan, TEST Employee Create, Vijayan K)
Check-in times visible (05:50 AM, 06:30 AM, 06:45 AM)
All records show 'Login' status for checked-in but not checked-out employees

admin_attendance_date_filter.description: Date filter in Attendance module works correctly

check_in_without_check_out_status.description: Employees who checked in but not checked out show status 'Login'

seed_data_creation: None - used existing data from previous check-ins
context_for_next_testing_agent: Star Rating Teams view fix verified - 'View members' now opens a dedicated Team Details view that completely replaces the teams table (no inline expansion). Team Details shows member cards with Name, Email, Stars, Unsafe, and View/Add buttons. Back button returns to Teams list. Admin Attendance shows all employee check-ins with proper status ('Login' for checked-in without checkout). Date filter works correctly.

verification_summary.issue_1_star_rating_view_members: FIXED - Members appear in dedicated Team Details view, not below teams table
verification_summary.issue_2_employee_checkin_sync: WORKING - All 3 employee check-ins visible in Admin Attendance (Adhitya Charan, TEST Employee, Vijayan K)
